org.svvrl.goal.core.repo
Class BuchiStore

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.repo.BuchiStore

public class BuchiStore
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides methods for interacting with Büchi Store.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

Method Detail

setCache

public static void setCache(boolean b)
Sets true to cache the first returned results.

Parameters:
b - true to cache the first returned results.

refresh

public static void refresh()
Forces to retrieve data from the remote Store in the next call to BuchiStore#getEntries().

getEntries

public static RemoteEntry[] getEntries()
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       org.xml.sax.SAXException
Returns all automata in Büchi Store as repository entries.

Returns:
repository entries describing all automata in Büchi Store
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is an error in network connection to Büchi Store
org.xml.sax.SAXException - if the remote XML file in Büchi Store is invalid

getThumbnail

public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage getThumbnail(RemoteEntry entry)
Retrieve the thumbnail of a specified entry from Büchi Store.

Parameters:
entry - a remote entry in Büchi Store
Returns:
the thumbnail of entry from Büchi Store, or null if retrieval of the thumbnail is failed

openAutomatonInBrowser

public static void openAutomatonInBrowser(RemoteEntry entry)
Opens the automaton described by a remote entry in the client's browse.

Parameters:
entry - a remote entry

openFormulaInBrowser

public static void openFormulaInBrowser(RemoteEntry entry)
Opens the formula described by a remote entry in the client's browse.

Parameters:
entry - a remote entry
